name: atgbuildhelper
short_description: This project was created to design a universal ANT build system that will build and deploy any ATG modules and applications. Using both ANT and ATG best practices, this ANT ATG builder is intended to build and deploy any client's ATG application with minimal setup.
summary: An ATG ANT build project that builds and deploys any ATG modules
